CHAT.comment: KESTUTIS ZADVYDAS, Petitioner v. LYNN UNDERDOWN AND IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE; and JOHN D. ASHCROFT, ATTORNEY GENERAL, ET AL., Petitioners v. KIM HO MA
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:18 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JAY W. STANSELL ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT MA
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ROBERT F. BARNARD ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER ZADVYDAS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF EDWIN S. KNEEDLER ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENTS IN NO. 99-7791 AND PETITIONERS IN NO. 00-38
CONSOLIDATED REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF JAY W STANSELL ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENT MA AND PETITIONER ZADVYDAS
